item.title: 国债收益率飙升反映了对更多长期债务的预期
item.description: 交易员们表示，较长期的美国国债收益率已飙升至数月高点，超过了较短期国债收益率的涨幅，其中一些差异反映出人们预期即将上任的特朗普政府将需要改变目前更多地依赖短期债务的做法。【原文：Longer-term U.S. Treasury yields have surged to multi-month highs, outpacing a rise in shorter-dated yields, with some of the disparity reflecting anticipation that the incoming Trump administration will need to change the current focus on relying more on short-term debt, traders say.】

item.title: 行业组织就拜登禁止在信用报告中提及医疗债务一事提起诉讼
item.description: 代表信用报告和信用社行业的两个团体提起诉讼，对美国总统乔-拜登即将卸任的政府通过的禁止将医疗债务纳入美国消费者信用报告的新规定提出质疑。【原文：Two groups representing the credit reporting and credit union industries have filed a lawsuit challenging a new rule adopted by U.S. President Joe Biden's outgoing administration banning the inclusion of medical debt in American consumers' credit reports.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亿万富翁莱昂-布莱克（Leon Black）正在洽谈收购《每日电讯报》事宜
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三报道，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）联合创始人兼前首席执行官莱昂-布莱克（Leon Black）正在洽谈成为收购《每日电讯报》的主要投资者。【原文：Leon Black, co-founder and former CEO of Apollo Global Management , is in talks to become the anchor investor in the acquisition of the Telegraph, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 巴西检察官就事实核查计划的变化质询美达公司
item.description: 巴西检察官周三命令社交媒体平台 Meta 澄清其最近宣布的对美国事实核查计划的修改是否也适用于南美国家。【原文：Brazilian prosecutors on Wednesday ordered that social media platform Meta clarify whether recently announced changes to its fact-checking program in the United States will also be applied to the South American country.】

item.title: 耶伦称美国外国投资委员会对美国钢铁公司与新日本钢铁公司受阻的合并案进行了 "透彻的分析
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周三表示，新日铁对美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）的收购受阻已得到一个跨部门国家安全审查机构的 "全面分析"，该机构已将分析报告送交乔-拜登总统。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said on Wednesday that Nippon Steel's blocked acquisition of U.S. Steel received a "thorough analysis" by an interagency national security review body that was sent to President Joe Biden.】

item.title: 美国 11 月批发库存降幅未修正为 0.2
item.description: 11 月份美国批发库存下降了 0.2%，与上个月的初步估计相同，原因是汽车和计算机设备等长寿命制成品的库存急剧下降。【原文：U.S. wholesale inventories fell 0.2% in November, as initially estimated last month, amid sharp declines in stocks of long-lasting manufactured goods like motor vehicles and computer equipment.】

item.title: 埃克森石油第四季度盈利疲软，炼油业务受挤压，股价下滑
item.description: 埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）股价在周三早盘交易中下跌近 2%，原因是这家美国最大的石油生产商警告称，第四季度炼油利润下降，整个业务回报率疲软。【原文：Exxon Mobil shares fell nearly 2% in early trading on Wednesday after the top U.S. oil producer warned of a decline in refining profits in the fourth quarter and weak returns across its operations.】

item.title: 肯塔基州福特合资工厂工人申请举行工会选举
item.description: 美国汽车工人联合会（United Auto Workers）周三发布消息称，该工会正在向全国劳工关系委员会提出申请，要求在肯塔基州的福特汽车合资电池厂举行选举。【原文：The United Auto Workers union is petitioning the National Labor Relations Board to hold an election at a Ford Motor joint-venture battery plant in Kentucky, the union said in a release Wednesday.】

item.title: 意大利国防部长淡化有关星链（Starlink）安全通信协议的讨论
item.description: 意大利国防部长吉多-克罗塞托（Guido Crosetto）周三表示，意大利国防部不支持与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的星链公司（Starlink）达成提供新的安全通信服务的协议，并正在研究一系列方案。【原文：The Italian defence ministry has not backed a deal with Elon Musk's Starlink to supply new secure communications services and is looking at a range of options, minister Guido Crosetto said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 全球投资者被债券市场大跌激怒，"发脾气 "曙光初现
item.description: 世界上一些最大的政府债券市场大幅下挫，美元飙升，给金融市场带来震荡，随着唐纳德-特朗普政策的不确定性增加，这种痛苦也在加深。【原文：A sharp selloff in some of the world's biggest government bond markets and a surge in the dollar are sending shockwaves through financial markets, with the pain seen deepening as uncertainty grows over Donald Trump's policies.】

item.title: 西西里咖啡烘焙商 Zicaffe 试图阻止 Zara 新开 Zacaffe 咖啡店
item.description: 西西里咖啡烘焙商 Zicaffe 要求欧盟知识产权局（EUIOP）阻止时装巨头 Inditex 为其新咖啡店使用 Zacaffe 这一名称，理由是该名称与其自有品牌过于相似。【原文：Sicilian coffee roaster Zicaffe has asked the European Union's Intellectual Property Office (EUIOP) to block fashion giant Inditex's use of the name Zacaffe for its new coffee shops, arguing the name is too similar to its own brand.】

item.title: 美元走强，石油涨幅缩小，供应紧张提供支撑
item.description: 由于美元走强，油价周三缩减了早些时候的涨幅，但继续从俄罗斯和欧佩克其他成员国的供应紧缩以及美国原油库存下降中获得支撑。【原文：Oil prices trimmed earlier gains on Wednesday as the dollar strengthened but continued to find support from a tightening of supplies from Russia and other OPEC members and a drop in U.S. crude stocks.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔与恩智浦半导体扩大合作，共同开发航空技术
item.description: 霍尼韦尔（Honeywell）和恩智浦半导体（NXP Semiconductors）周三表示，双方将扩大合作，为航空和自主飞行开发人工智能驱动的技术。【原文：Honeywell and NXP Semiconductors will expand their partnership to develop AI-driven technology for aviation and autonomous flying, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 道富资产管理公司首席执行官：美国股票 "例外论 "仍将继续
item.description: 道富证券（State Street）资产管理部门首席执行官周三表示，受大型科技公司的资金实力以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次担任总统期间的投资者友好政策的推动，美股今年有望延续超预期表现。【原文：U.S. stocks look set to extend their outperformance this year driven by the financial firepower of big tech firms and investor friendly policies under a second Donald Trump presidency, the CEO of State Street's asset management arm said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美元扼守全球外汇市场，为欧元平价奠定基础：路透社民意调查
item.description: 路透社调查显示，相当多的外汇预测专家预计，美元将在 2025 年升至与欧元平价的水平。【原文：The U.S. dollar will tighten its stranglehold over global currency markets with little standing in the way of its remarkable run, and a significant number of foreign exchange forecasters polled by Reuters expect it to rise to parity with the euro in 2025.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量意外下降，表明今年年初劳动力市场稳定，尽管一些下岗工人在寻找新工作时遇到困难。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits unexpectedly fell last week, pointing to a stable labor market at the start of the year though some laid-off workers are experiencing difficulties finding new jobs.】

item.title: AT&T 将为停电提供账单积分，以 "补偿 "用户损失
item.description: 美国电信巨头 AT&T 公司周三表示，在 2024 年经历了几次重大网络中断后，该公司将为网络中断提供账单积分，作为吸引客户的新举措的一部分。【原文：U.S. telecom giant AT&T said on Wednesday it would offer bill credits for network outages as part of a new initiative to attract customers, after the industry experienced several significant disruptions in 2024.】

item.title: 美国 12 月私营部门就业人数增长放缓
item.description: 周三发布的《ADP全国就业报告》显示，12月份美国私营企业薪资增长大幅放缓。【原文：U.S. private payrolls growth slowed sharply in December, the ADP National Employment Report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特朗普称涡轮机为 "垃圾 "后，欧洲风能股遭受重创
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他将努力确保在他的任期内 "不建造风车"，并在距离他就职不到两周的时间里批评风电行业，此后欧洲风电股周三下跌。【原文：European wind power stocks fell on Wednesday after U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said he would try to ensure that "no windmills" are built on his watch, criticising the sector less than two weeks before he is due to take office.】

item.title: 在妹妹提起诉讼后，OpenAI 老板否认性侵妹妹
item.description: OpenAI首席执行官萨姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）否认在其妹妹小时候对她实施过性虐待，此前她在美国提起诉讼，指控奥特曼在 1997 年至 2006 年间经常对她实施性虐待。【原文：OpenAI Chief Executive Sam Altman has denied sexually abusing his sister when she was a child, after she filed a lawsuit in the United States accusing him of regularly sexually abusing her between 1997 and 2006.】

item.title: 美联储主席沃勒：可能会有更多削减，但时机取决于通胀进展
item.description: 美联储理事克里斯托弗-沃勒（Christopher Waller）周三表示，通胀率在2025年应继续下降，并允许美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）进一步降低利率，但降息的步伐并不确定。【原文：Inflation should continue falling in 2025 and allow the U.S. Federal Reserve to further reduce interest rates, though at an uncertain pace, Federal Reserve governor Christopher Waller said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官预言前路漫漫，量子计算股票受挫
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）表示，量子计算技术的实际应用可能还需要二十年的时间，量子计算股票周三下挫，暂停了长达一年的涨势。【原文：Quantum computing stocks sank on Wednesday, pausing a year-long rally, after Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said the technology's practical use was likely two decades away.】

item.title: Northvolt 所有者投票决定继续运营，同时寻求财政救助
item.description: Northvolt 的所有者周三投票决定继续运营，该公司表示，这家瑞典电动汽车电池制造商将在未来几周内努力寻找新的支持者和资金。【原文：The owners of Northvolt voted to continue operations on Wednesday, the company said, while the Swedish electric vehicle battery maker scrambles to find new backers and funding in coming weeks.】

item.title: 2024 年末，欧元区经济在贸易担忧中走向低迷
item.description: 周三，几项关键指标显示，欧元区经济在衰退中徘徊了一年多之后，在2024年年底出现了疲软，这表明人们期盼已久的复苏前景依然遥远。【原文：The euro zone economy, skirting recession for more than a year, ended 2024 on a weak note, several key indicators showed on Wednesday, suggesting that a long hoped for recovery remains a distant prospect.】

item.title: 特朗普交易摇摆不定，跌跌不休的欧洲股市吸引投资者回归
item.description: 在 2024 年创下相对于华尔街表现不佳的记录之后，由于担心美国新任总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的经济冲击会增强国际市场的吸引力，被打压的欧洲股市正在吸引投资者回归。【原文：Beaten-down European stocks are luring investors back after a record underperformance versus Wall Street in 2024, as fears about U.S. economic shocks under incoming President Donald Trump boost the appeal of international markets.】

item.title: Albertsons 季度销售额不及预期
item.description: 本周三，Albertsons 第三季度销售额未达预期，原因是沃尔玛和克罗格（Kroger）等大型零售商提供大量折扣和促销活动的激烈竞争损害了需求。【原文：Albertsons missed third-quarter sales expectations on Wednesday, as intense competition from bigger retailers such as Walmart and Kroger offering heavy discounts and promotions hurt demand.】

item.title: 尽管经济不景气，中国预计新年旅游人数仍将增加
item.description: 中国预计参加即将到来的农历新年旅游高峰的人数将会增加，尽管经济不景气，但当局预计在为期 40 天的节日期间，国内旅游人数将达到创纪录的 90 亿人次。【原文：China expects an increase in the number of people joining the coming Lunar New Year travel rush, with authorities estimating a record 9 billion domestic trips will be made during the 40-day period of festivities, despite the stuttering economy.】

item.title: 测试在 Facebook Marketplace 上显示 eBay 列表的 Meta
item.description: Meta 公司周三表示，它将在德国、法国和美国启动一项测试，使买家能够在 Facebook Marketplace 上浏览 eBay 上的列表，然后在 eBay 上完成交易。【原文：Meta said on Wednesday it would launch a test in Germany, France and the United States that will enable buyers to browse listings from eBay on Facebook Marketplace and then complete their transactions on eBay.】

item.title: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）报道：特朗普酝酿宣布国家经济紧急状态，以便实施新的关税计划
item.description: 美国有线电视新闻网（CNN）周三援引熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道称，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普正在考虑宣布国家经济紧急状态，以便为对盟友和对手征收一系列普遍关税提供法律依据。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump is considering declaring a national economic emergency to provide legal justification for a series of universal tariffs on allies and adversaries, CNN reported on Wednesday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消息称汉莎航空将于下周收购意大利 ITA 航空公司股份
item.description: 一位熟悉情况的消息人士周三告诉路透社，汉莎航空将于1月13日收购意大利国有航空公司ITA的股份，从而结束多年的谈判。【原文：Lufthansa is set to acquire a stake in Italian state-owned airline ITA on Jan. 13, a source familiar with the situation told Reuters on Wednesday, bringing to a close years of talks.】
